package.name: Benchmark
package.summary: Framework to benchmark PHP scripts or function calls.
package.description: Framework to benchmark PHP scripts or function calls.

release.notes:
+ Added Profiler class.
(Contribution by Matthias Englert)

+ Added getOutput() to print the results in human readable format and display() to show it.
This functions will automatically detect the environment to select HTML or text output.
+ Added a new param $auto to constructor.
When true is passed, the results will be output automatically at the end of the script execution.
(Contribution by Ludovico Magnocavallo)
